repos.name: proagent
repos.description: Provectus Agent Framework - A role-agnostic, extensible agent framework that enables every Provectus employee to leverage AI agents for their work. Includes 10 role personas with skills, commands, templates, multi-role orchestration, external repo discovery, analytics, and integrations with Slack/GitHub/GitLab/Google Drive.

repos.name: proagent-repo GUI
repos.description: Extended version of ProAgent with GUI capabilities, SDLC orchestration pipeline, Tactical Agentic Coding (TAC) skills framework, Zero Trust Execution (ZTE) engine, MCP server integrations, meta-prompts for quality gates, and validation workflows. A more mature version of the ProAgent framework with full SDLC pipeline support.

repos.name: ralph-orchestrator
repos.description: A hat-based multi-agent orchestration framework written in Rust that implements the Ralph Wiggum technique for autonomous task completion. Features a hat system for specialized agent personas, event-driven coordination, backpressure enforcement, 20+ preset workflows, multi-backend support (Claude, Kiro, Gemini, Codex, Amp, Copilot, OpenCode), interactive TUI, session recording, and spec-driven development methodology.

assets.description: Comprehensive README with architecture, CLI reference, presets library, installation, and philosophy
Agent philosophy document: Ralph Tenets, anti-patterns, build/test instructions, TUI validation, behavioral verification

repos.name: skills
repos.description: Anthropic's official skills repository for Claude. Contains 16+ self-contained skills for document creation (DOCX, PDF, PPTX, XLSX), creative design (canvas, algorithmic art, themes, brand guidelines), MCP server building, webapp testing, internal communications, Slack GIF creation, skill creation, and web artifact building. Serves as a Claude Code plugin marketplace.
